definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The Allosaurus was a meat eater.
Most predators ' eyes are in the front of their head.
sentences.chinese: 大部分肉食動物的眼睛都長在頭的前方。

sentences.english: Albertosaurus was a meat eater. It killed other dinosaurs to eat them.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾貝塔龍是肉食動物，它捕食其它的恐龍。

sentences.english: You describe yourself as a born-again carnivore.
sentences.chinese: 你形容自己是再生的肉食動物。

sentences.english: Big, meat-eating animals are in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 大型肉食動物遇到了麻煩。

sentences.english: The carnivorous animals are characterized especially by large, sharp canine teeth.
sentences.chinese: 肉食動物的特徵是大而尖的犬齒。

sentences.english: And with two rows of teeth, the predatory fish is also terrifying.
sentences.chinese: 它有兩排尖牙，這種肉食動物也非常令人恐懼。

definition: to love ease and comfort and hate work (idiom)
"mandarin ducks" pot (hot pot with a divider, containing spicy soup on one side, mild soup on the other)
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
produce/fresh fruits and vegetables/fresh aquatic food/fresh herbs
hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
